comment: f_smile f_frown f_confused f_angry f_sad f_neutral body:b_normal b_engaged b_bored b_tapping b_phone b_angry

rp_5_intro.text: Hi there.  I've been wondering about this place, it's been a while since I've had some pizza.  I figured this would be a nice place to try out. By the way, nice uniform you got there.

rp_10_past_reaction.text: I sorta got sick last time I had pizza.  I'm not sure what happened, but today I saw your nice looking store, and I decided I'm going to try a slice of something.

rp_10_greet.text: Hi! This seemed like a nice place to eat.

rp_10_first_time.text: Yep first time I've enterred the place.

rp_10_customer_initiates.text: I was thinking about getting a slice.

rp_10_insulted.text: I'm not sure I like this place or you.

rp_10_rude.text: That's not a nice way to greet a customer! Anyway, I'd like a slice with no drink, but I can't decide on the topping. What do you suggest?

rp_10_offeredhelp.text: I'd like a slice with no drink, but I can't decide on the topping. What do you suggest?

rp_10_impatient.text: Are you gonna take my order or something?

rp_10_fed_up.text: The service here stinks. I'm gone.

rp_10_notgermane.text: I'm really not sure what you're going on about, are you gonna take my order?

rp_20_asked_twice.text: Like I said, I do not want a drink, I want a slice.  And I don't know about the toppings.

rp_20_decided_full.text: Yeah, thats about right. I'll have a slice of sausage and mushroom.

rp_20_decided_mushrooms.text: Mushrooms sound good. Now what meat goes with mushrooms?

rp_20_decided_sausage.text: Sausage sounds perfect, but I want a veggie too.  Can you suggest a veggie?

rp_20_pizza_prefer.text: Oh my, you actually cares about my preferences?  That is so refreshing! So, since you asked, I love sausage and mushroom.  But last time I had pizza I got sick, so I'm a bit afraid to try again.

rp_20_carno_prefer.text: Oh thank you for asking.  Actually, I just want a little of each, I'm thinking one meat, one veggie.

rp_20_prefer_or_want.text: Are you asking what pizza I want today?  Or what I've had in the past.  Can you be more clear for me?

rp_20_meat1.text: Some meat sounds good.   Any other meats good here?

rp_20_decide_sausage_veg.text: Some meat sounds good.  Maybe one meat, one veggie?  I got it.  Sausage and one veggie?  Any suggestion on the veggie?

rp_20_veg1.text: Some veggie sounds good.   Any other vegetable good here?

rp_20_veg_uprefer.text: Oh, thanks for asking.  Actually, I've always enjoyed mushrooms and .. well, some kind of meat.

rp_20_meat_uprefer.text: Oh, thanks for asking.  Actually, I've always enjoyed sausage and .. well, some kind of veggie.

rp_20_decide_mushroom_meat.text: Some veggie sounds good.  But I want some meat too. I got it.  Mushroom and one meat?  Any suggestion on the meat?

rp_20_glutten_disclose.text: You know, the last time I had pizza I felt horrible hours later.  My uncle had the same problem, it turned out he had a glutten allergy.  Come to think of it, maybe I do too?  Maybe I should just avoid pizza.

rp_20_considering_topping.text: Maybe just one meat and a veggie.

rp_20_considering_hawaiin.text: Yech- way too sweet for me.

rp_20_considering_crap.text: Maybe you like that type of thing, but that's not for me.

rp_20_considering_fish.text: Fish and pizza do not go together.
Fish and pizza do not go together.

rp_20_considering_dog.text: You gotta be joking, no one eats a dog pizza.

rp_20_considering_bird.text: Birds of a feather, flock together, and I will eat that pizza- NEVER!

rp_20_self_discovery.text: You know, I do not usually eat pizza so it has been a while, but lets see. How about sausage and a veggie?

rp_20_impatient.text: I just don't know what toppings.

rp_20_fed_up.text: I won't be visiting here again.  Good day.

rp_22_correct.text: Yeah, thats about right. I'll have a slice of sausage and mushroom.

rp_22_wrong_toppings.text: Aren't you listening? I want sausage and a veggie.

rp_22_disgusted.text: I don't like your sense of humour.  Good day.

rp_22_veg.text: Almost. You know what I think? I'll have a slice of sausage and mushroom.

rp_22_what_veg.text: Oh, thanks for asking.  Actually, I've always enjoyed mushrooms and .. well, some kind of meat.

rp_20_nodrink.text: I've already said I want sausage and one vegetable.Can you help me pick a vegetable?

rp_24_what_veg.text: Oh, thanks for asking.  Actually, I've always enjoyed mushrooms and .. well, some kind of meat.

rp_22_frustrated.text: I've already said I want sausage and one vegetable.Can you help me pick a vegetable?

rp_22_veg_hint.text: Not quite right.  What goes good with sausage?

rp_22_veg_giveup.text: Awe, I give up.  Just get me sausage and mushroom.

rp_22_impatient.text: I am certain I want sausage.  Can you help me pick the veggie?

rp_24_impatient.text: I am certain I want mushroom.  Can you help me pick a meat?

rp_24_correct.text: Yeah, that sounds good.  I'll go with sausage and mushroom.

rp_24_meat_hint.text: Not quite right.  What goes good with mushrooms?

rp_24_meat_giveup.text: Awe, I give up.  Just get me sausage and mushroom.

rp_24_frustrated.text: I've already said I want mushroom and one meat.Can you help me pick a meat?

rp_30_time_to_reconsider.text: Now that I think about it, last time I had pizza, I think I had a bad reaction.  I'm suspicious it might be the gluten.

rp_30_remember_gluten.text: Now, come to think of it, last time I had pizza, I think I had a bad reaction.  I'm suspicious it might be the gluten.

rp_32_decided_nogluten.text: A no glutten option?  That's fantastic!

rp_32_fed_up.text: I guess this was a bad idea.  Thanks for your time.

rp_40_finished.text: Perfect.  I have to say I'm very pleased with the service here at Paizanos! This is the current Game Over!

rp_40_dont_forget.text: Don't forget glutten free.  Please write that down and read it all back to me.

rp_40_restate_order.text: How hard can it be?>  I want a gluten free slice of sausage and mushroom.  Can you please write it down and read it back to me?

rp_990_complimented.text: Thanks. I got it at Brooks Brothers.

rp_990_complimented_too_much.text: Enough about me. Can we get on with my pizza?

rp_990_insulted_too_much.text: I think I'll go somewhere else for lunch.

rp_990_super_insulted.text: Fuck you and the horse you rode in on! I'm leaving!

rp_990_rude.text: Um, I not quite comfortable with that.

rp_990_hard_of_hearing.text: Excuse me. I'm a little hard of hearing. Can you speak more slowly and clearly, please?

rp_990_not_understand.text: Didn't catch that. Can you speak more slowly and clearly?

rp_990_fed_up.text: I wont be visiting here again.  Good day.

rp_990_nonseq.text: What does that have to do with the price of peas in China?
